p: Several transcripts associated with generalized stress responses and/or self‐defense mechanisms were differentially expressed by larvae in each treatment but at varying levels of intensity. For example, larvae exposed to both harmful algal species responded by altering the expression of several transcripts associated with antioxidant defense mechanisms (Figure 5a–c). Specifically, larvae exposed to C. polykrikoides up‐regulated multiple transcripts associated with catalase, peroxidase, and superoxide dismutase whereas exposure to A. anophagefferens caused similar transcripts to be down‐regulated (Figure 5a–c). Within the acidification treatment only a single transcript corresponding to peroxidase (comp973279_c0_seq1; see Supporting Information Tables S3–S5) was observed to be differentially ( padj < 0.05) expressed and there were no antioxidant transcripts differentially expressed by larvae exposed to thermal stress (Figure 5b).
